description: Aaron Bruiser and Charlie Harding have much to give this holiday season. Late one evening, while walking the streets, Aaron finds Luke Adams filthy and in need of some help. He takes Luke to a hotel where he offers him a warm shower and some new clean clothes. As Aaron draws a warm bath, Luke disrobes and shows off his incredible bubble butt. Aaron, a happily married man, is shy at first but as Luke comes on stronger and stronger, Aaron cannot control himself. He gives in and learns that what Luke really needed all along was a firm cock.
title: My Two Daddies Part 1
